Detailed Description

Base class for sounds.

A sound object is an object which holds all the initial data required to play a particular sound. Sound object is normally used to create an instances of a channel to play that sound.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

virtual ting::Ref<aumiks::Channel> aumiks::Sound::CreateChannel ( ) const [pure virtual]

Channel factory method.

Creates an instance of the channel which can later be used to play that sound.

Returns:
a newly created instance of the channel for this sound.

Implemented in aumiks::WavSound.
